content: Thankfully, each of the Poison Chief fights is pretty much the same. You can expect the same moveset and should prepare for them in the same way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rhino Watch Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 2'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully, each of the Poison Chief fights is pretty much the same. You can expect the same moveset and should prepare for them in the same way.
